rows.label: tlk44510182_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I don't know what the outlanders will
think of all this... Will they forgive us?
Or will they never trust us again?

rows.label: tlk44510182_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently the Luxurian royal family
was never descended from Adel...
It was all a lie.

rows.label: tlk44510182_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Everyone seems dismayed by the news,
but I'm not actually all that bothered.

rows.label: tlk44510182_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Whether Adel was our ancestor or
not, my prayers to him are still sincere.
I still believe they reach him somehow...
